translated: May we also be endowed with and perfect in the perfection of wisdom and skill in means in the same way that the bodhisattva great being Dharmodgata is endowed with and perfect in the perfection of wisdom and skill in means.🔽May we also be endowed with and perfect in the perfection of wisdom and skill in means in the same way that the bodhisattva great being Dharmodgata is endowed with and perfect in the perfection of wisdom and skill in means.”

translated: I only thought about the perfection of wisdom, and I did not ask that voice how far I should go or from whom I would find the perfection of wisdom.”

translated: Having heard this from the image of the Tathāgata, I set out in the direction of the east as instructed, and from a distance I saw the noble one teaching.

analyzed: ces des de la lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba khal stong byin no //

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te /

analyzed: me tog kha cig gis ni /

original: sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so //
analyzed: sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so //

original: me tog kha cig gis ni /
analyzed: me tog kha cig gis ni /
translated: With some of the flowers

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan pa ting ba la 'dug ste /
translated: Then, after seven years had passed, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata rose from his meditative absorption, came to the Dharma seat, and sat down on the prepared seat.

analyzed: 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to //
translated: Surrounded and venerated by many hundreds of thousands in the assembly, he taught the perfection of wisdom.🔽Then, as soon as the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita saw the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dharmodgata,

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo //
translated: He attained such happiness as a monk who has entered the first concentration and is one-pointedly attentive.

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni / 'di lta ste /
translated: Then the bodhisattva great being Dharmodgata taught the perfection of wisdom as follows:🔽“All phenomena are the same, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is the same.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do; ;chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do; ;chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do //
translated: All phenomena are void, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is void.

original: chos thams cad g-yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g-yo ba med pa nyid do //🔽chos thams @518a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad g-yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g-yo ba med pa nyid do // chos thams @518a *//

original: cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do //
analyzed: cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do //
translated: All phenomena are without conceit, and therefore the perfection of wisdom is without conceit.

original: chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Since all phenomena are without arrogance, the perfection of wisdom is without arrogance.

original: chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rog gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rog gcig pa nyid do //
translated: Since all phenomena are of one taste, the perfection of wisdom is of one taste.

original: chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
translated: Since all phenomena are limitless, the perfection of wisdom is limitless.

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do //
translated: Since all phenomena are unborn, the perfection of wisdom is unborn.

original: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Since all phenomena are unceasing, the perfection of wisdom is unceasing.

original: nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
translated: Since space is limitless, the perfection of wisdom is limitless.

original: rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //

original: ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs nyid do //
analyzed: ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs nyid do //
translated: Mount Meru is variegated, and so is the perfection of wisdom variegated.

original: nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Space is nonconceptual, and so is the perfection of wisdom nonconceptual.

original: gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
translated: Form is limitless, and so is the perfection of wisdom limitless.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
translated: Similarly, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are limitless, and so is the perfection of wisdom limitless.

original: sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
translated: The earth element is limitless, and so is the perfection of wisdom limitless.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid @518b do; ;nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid @518b do; ;nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
translated: the water element, the fire element, and the wind element are boundless, the perfection of wisdom is boundless.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do //

analyzed: chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do //

analyzed: chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do //

analyzed: chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: The sameness of the destruction of all dharmas is the sameness of the destruction of the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is non-action because all dharmas are non-action.🔽The perfection of wisdom is non-action because all dharmas are non-action.

analyzed: chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du reg par bya'o //

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to //

translated: the samādhi called Equality of the Destruction of All Dharmas, the samādhi called Non-Action of All Dharmas, and the samādhi called Inconceivable of All Dharmas.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de la sogs par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur ro //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /

analyzed: chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste /

translated: Subhūti, immediately after the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sadāprarudita attained the six hundred thousand samādhis, in the east, south, west, north,

analyzed: steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid
translated: in the intermediate directions, below and above, in the worlds of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, he saw as many blessed buddhas as there are sands of the Ganges River, surrounded by assemblies of monks and bodhisattvas, teaching this very subject,

analyzed: dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo //

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa /

translated: surrounded by the saṅgha of monks and facing a host of bodhisattvas, teaching this very perfection of wisdom, with this very name, and with these very syllables.

translated: He will become one who has inconceivable learning and an ocean of learning.🔽Wherever he is born, he will not be separated from the buddhas.

analyzed: skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skye ste /

analyzed: tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to //

original: des mi khyom pa thams cad ni /
analyzed: des mi khyom pa thams cad ni /

original: spangs / ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni /
analyzed: spangs / ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni /
translated: has been abandoned, and all that is included in it

original: bsgrubs so // rab 'byor /
analyzed: bsgrubs so // rab 'byor /

analyzed: rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrubs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that through this one of many explanations this perfection of wisdom accomplishes the knowledge of a knower of all aspects for bodhisattva great beings.

analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen @520a *//

translated: those bodhisattva great beings who want to attain the knowledge of a knower of all aspects should practice this perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
